MPFRExample.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file MPFRExample.cpp
00003 
00004  * \brief An example of calling RandomLib::MPFRNormal.
00005  *
00006  * Compile, link, and run with, e.g.,
00007  * g++ -I../include -O2 -o MPFRExample MPFRExample.cpp -lmpfr -lgmp
00008  * ./MPFRExample
00009  *
00010  * $Id: cd1cf122149735ed6136a9df8f1ec8219207dbdc $
00011  *
00012  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2012) <charles@karney.com> and licensed under
00013  * the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00014  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00015  **********************************************************************/
00016 
00017 #include <cstdio>
00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <ctime>                // for time()
00020 #include <RandomLib/MPFRRandom.hpp>
00021 #include <RandomLib/MPFRNormal.hpp>
00022 
00023 int main() {
00024   gmp_randstate_t r;
00025   gmp_randinit_mt(r);
00026   time_t t0 = std::time(0);
00027   gmp_randseed_ui(r, t0);
00028   mpfr_t z;
00029 
00030   {
00031     mpfr_prec_t prec = 240; mpfr_init2(z, prec);
00032     std::cout << "Sample from the unit normal distribution at precision "
00033               << prec << "\n";
00034     RandomLib::MPFRNormal<> norm; // bits = 32, by default
00035     for (int k = 0; k < 10; ++k) {
00036       norm(z, r, MPFR_RNDN);    // Obtain a normal deviate
00037       mpfr_out_str(stdout, 10, 0, z, MPFR_RNDN); std::cout << "\n";
00038     }
00039   }
00040 
00041   {
00042     mpfr_prec_t prec = 20; mpfr_set_prec(z, prec);
00043     std::cout << "Sample ranges from the normal distribution at precision "
00044               << prec << "\n";
00045     RandomLib::MPFRNormal<1> norm; // choose bits = 1 so that the ranges
00046     RandomLib::MPFRRandom<1> x;    // are not too narrow
00047     for (int k = 0; k < 10; ++k) {
00048       norm(x, r);               // Obtain an MPFRRandom range
00049       x(z, MPFR_RNDD);          // Lower bound of range
00050       std::cout << "[" << mpfr_get_d(z, MPFR_RNDD) << ",";
00051       x(z, MPFR_RNDU);          // Upper bound of range
00052       std::cout << mpfr_get_d(z, MPFR_RNDU) << "] -> ";
00053       x(z, r, MPFR_RNDN);       // Realize the normal deviate
00054       mpfr_out_str(stdout, 10, 0, z, MPFR_RNDN); std::cout << "\n";
00055     }
00056   }
00057 
00058   // Clean up
00059   mpfr_clear(z); mpfr_free_cache(); gmp_randclear(r);
00060 }
